document.full_text: the san francisco giants have become the first professional sports team to join the "it gets better" campaign against bullying of gay youths, the online activist group change.org said on tuesday.
document.title: san francisco giants join drive against bullying of gays
lines_and_colors: the san francisco giants have become the first professional sports team to join the "it gets better" campaign against bullying of gay youths, the online activist group change.org said on tuesday.
